description.zh-cn: 位于美国宾夕法尼亚州费城的世界著名私立研究型大学，是常春藤盟校之一。由本杰明·富兰克林创建于1740年，是美国第五古老的高等教育机构，也是美国第一所从事科学技术和人文教育的现代高等学校。
description.en: A world-renowned private research university located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. It is a member of the Ivy League, founded in 1740 by Benjamin Franklin, and is the fifth-oldest institution of higher education in the United States and the first American university to pursue modern higher education in science, technology, and the humanities.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国开国元勋之一，宾夕法尼亚大学的创建者。
description.en: One of the Founding Fathers of the United States and the founder of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 宾夕法尼亚大学的第一届毕业生，创建了北美洲第一所医学院。
description.en: A member of the first graduating class of the University of Pennsylvania and founder of the first medical school in North America.

nodes.id: 宾夕法尼亚大学医学院

zh-cn: 宾夕法尼亚大学医学院
en: Perelman School of Medicine at the University of Pennsylvania

description.zh-cn: 由约翰·莫根于1765年创建，是北美洲第一所医学院，隶属于宾夕法尼亚大学。
description.en: Founded by John Morgan in 1765, it is the first medical school in North America and part of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 宾夕法尼亚大学的第一任院长，苏格兰启蒙运动的支持者。
description.en: The first provost of the University of Pennsylvania and a supporter of the Scottish Enlightenment.

description.zh-cn: 世界上第一台全数字电子计算机，由宾夕法尼亚大学工程学院于1946年设计完成。
description.en: The first fully digital electronic computer in the world, designed by the School of Engineering at the University of Pennsylvania and completed in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 由美国东北部地区的八所私立大学组成的体育赛事联盟，现已引申为美国顶尖学府的代名词。
description.en: An athletic conference composed of eight private universities in the Northeastern United States, now also commonly refers to these universities as a group of elite colleges.

description.zh-cn: 由美国和加拿大顶尖研究型大学组成的联盟。
description.en: An organization of leading research universities in the United States and Canada.

description.zh-cn: 世界顶尖大学校长组成的国际性论坛。
description.en: An international forum composed of presidents from the world's leading universities.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪至19世纪初苏格兰的一段思想、科学与文化成就迸发的时期。
description.en: The period in 18th- and early 19th-century Scotland characterized by an outpouring of intellectual and scientific accomplishments.

en: Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania

description.zh-cn: 宾夕法尼亚大学下属的商学院。
description.en: The business school of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 美国第45任及第47任总统，宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: The 45th and 47th President of the United States, an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 企业家和商业巨头，SpaceX、特斯拉公司CEO及首席设计师，PayPal创始人，Solarcity主席。宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Entrepreneur and business magnate, CEO and Chief Designer of SpaceX, CEO and Product Architect of Tesla, Inc., founder of PayPal, and chairman of SolarCity. An alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 投资家、慈善家，宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Investor and philanthropist, an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 中国建筑学家、建筑史学家和教育家，宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Chinese architect, architectural historian, and educator, an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代著名建筑师、诗人，宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Famous modern Chinese architect and poet, an alumna of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 台北市长、律师、前立法委员，宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Mayor of Taipei, lawyer, and former legislator; an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 律师、台湾立法委员，宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Lawyer and legislator in Taiwan; an alumna of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 前任美国驻华大使、前犹他州州长，宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Former U.S. Ambassador to China and former Governor of Utah; an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 语言学家、哲学家、思想家和政论家，宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Linguist, philosopher, cognitive scientist, historian, social critic, and political activist; an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔建筑师，宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Chinese-American architect, an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 台裔经济学家、香港中文大学教授，宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Taiwanese-born economist and professor at the Chinese University of Hong Kong; an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名物理学家，宾大历史上第一位中国女博士，中国半导体科学事业开拓者之一。
description.en: Renowned Chinese physicist, the first Chinese female Ph.D. in the history of the University of Pennsylvania, and one of the pioneers of China's semiconductor science.

description.zh-cn: 本杰明·富兰克林是宾夕法尼亚大学的创建者。
description.en: Benjamin Franklin was the founder of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 宾夕法尼亚大学是享誉国际的常春藤盟校之一。
description.en: The University of Pennsylvania is one of the internationally renowned Ivy League schools.

description.zh-cn: 宾夕法尼亚大学是美洲大学协会的12所创始校之一。
description.en: The University of Pennsylvania is one of the 12 founding members of the Association of American Universities.

description.zh-cn: 宾夕法尼亚大学是全球大学校长论坛成员。
description.en: The University of Pennsylvania is a member of the Global University Leaders Forum.

description.zh-cn: 约翰·莫根是宾夕法尼亚大学1765年第一届毕业生。
description.en: John Morgan was a member of the first graduating class of the University of Pennsylvania in 1765.

relationships.target: 宾夕法尼亚大学医学院

description.zh-cn: 1765年，宾夕法尼亚大学的第一届毕业生约翰·莫根创建了北美洲第一所医学院。
description.en: In 1765, John Morgan, a member of the first graduating class of the University of Pennsylvania, founded the first medical school in North America.

relationships.source: 宾夕法尼亚大学医学院

description.zh-cn: 医学院是宾夕法尼亚大学下属的学院。
description.en: The School of Medicine is a constituent school of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 威廉·史密斯是宾夕法尼亚大学的第一任院长。
description.en: William Smith was the first provost of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 宾夕法尼亚大学的前身费城学院深受当时苏格兰教育改革的影响。
description.en: The College of Philadelphia, the predecessor to the University of Pennsylvania, was greatly influenced by the Scottish educational reforms of the time.

description.zh-cn: 1946年，宾夕法尼亚大学工程学院设计出了世界上第一台全数字电子计算机“ENIAC”。
description.en: In 1946, the School of Engineering at the University of Pennsylvania designed the world's first all-digital electronic computer, 'ENIAC'.

description.zh-cn: 沃顿商学院是宾夕法尼亚大学下属的大学部学院之一。
description.en: The Wharton School is one of the undergraduate colleges of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 唐纳德·特朗普是宾夕法尼亚大学的校友。
description.en: Donald Trump is an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 伊隆·马斯克是宾夕法尼亚大学的校友。
description.en: Elon Musk is an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 沃伦·巴菲特是宾夕法尼亚大学的校友。
description.en: Warren Buffett is an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成是宾夕法尼亚大学的校友。
description.en: Liang Sicheng is an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 林徽因是宾夕法尼亚大学的校友。
description.en: Lin Huiyin is an alumna of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 蒋万安是宾夕法尼亚大学的校友。
description.en: Chiang Wan-an is an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 苏巧慧是宾夕法尼亚大学的校友。
description.en: Su Chiao-hui is an alumna of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 洪博培是宾夕法尼亚大学的校友。
description.en: Jon Huntsman Jr. is an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 诺姆·乔姆斯基是宾夕法尼亚大学的校友。
description.en: Noam Chomsky is an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 贝聿铭是宾夕法尼亚大学的校友。
description.en: I. M. Pei is an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 郎咸平是宾夕法尼亚大学的校友。
description.en: Larry Lang is an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 林兰英是宾大历史上第一位中国女博士。
description.en: Lin Lanying was the first Chinese female to receive a Ph.D. from the University of Pennsylvania.
